00056 namespace detail {
00057   template<typename T>
00058   T readT(std::istream& is) {
00059     T data;
00060     is.read((char *)(&data), sizeof(T));
00061     if (!is) throw std::runtime_error("read failed");
00062     return data;
00063   }
00064 }
00065 
00067 class read_datastream {
00068 public:
00069   read_datastream(processor::base::sptr pp)
00070     : processor_(pp) {}
00071   ~read_datastream() {}
00072 
00073   class service_read_data_stream : public network::client::service_net {
00074   public:
00075     typedef boost::shared_ptr<service_read_data_stream> sptr;
00076     virtual ~service_read_data_stream() {}
00077 
00078     static sptr make(const network::protocol::header& h,
00079                      const network::broadcaster::directory& d) {
00080       return sptr(new service_read_data_stream(h, d));
00081     }
00082 
00083     virtual void put_result(processor::result_base::sptr r) {
00084       std::cout << r->name() << " " << make_time_label(r->approx_ptime()) << " ";
00085       r->dump_data(std::cout) << std::endl;
00086     }
00087     
00088   protected:
00089     service_read_data_stream(const network::protocol::header& h,
00090                              const network::broadcaster::directory& d)
00091       : service_net(h, d) {}
00092 
00093     std::string make_time_label(ptime t) const {
00094       std::stringstream oss;
00095       oss.imbue(std::locale(oss.getloc(), new boost::posix_time::time_facet("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%s")));
00096       oss << t;
00097       return oss.str();
00098     }
00099   private:
00100     service_read_data_stream(const service_read_data_stream& );
00101     service_read_data_stream& operator=(const service_read_data_stream& );
00102   } ;
00103 
00104   bool process_file(std::string filename) {
00105     std::ifstream ifs(filename.c_str(), std::ios::binary);
00106     while (ifs) {
00107       try {
00108         header_ = detail::readT<network::protocol::header>(ifs);
00109         if (header_.length()) {
00110           std::string bytes(" ", header_.length());
00111           ifs.read(&bytes[0], header_.length());
00112           if (header_.id() == directory_.id()) {
00113             directory_.update(header_.length(), &bytes[0]);
00114           } else {
00115             if (processor_) {
00116               // make up service object
00117               processor::service_base::sptr sp
00118                 (service_read_data_stream::make(get_header(), get_directory()));
00119               processor_->process(sp, &bytes[0], &bytes[0]+header_.length());
00120             }
00121           }
00122         } else {
00123           return false;
00124         }
00125       } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00126 //      std::cout << "AAA " << e.what() << std::endl;
00127         return false;
00128       }
00129     }
00130     return true;
00131   }
00132 
00133 protected:
00134   const network::broadcaster::directory& get_directory() const { return directory_; }
00135   const network::protocol::header& get_header() const { return header_; }
00136 
00137 private:
00138   network::broadcaster::directory directory_;
00139   network::protocol::header       header_;
00140   processor::base::sptr           processor_;
00141 } ;
00142 
00143 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00144 {
00145   namespace po = boost::program_options;
00146   po::options_description desc("Allowed options");
00147   desc.add_options()
00148     ("help,?",                                           "produce help message")
00149     ("version,v",                                        "display version")
00150     ("config,c", po::value<std::string>(),               "path to XML configuration file")
00151     ("key,k",    po::value<std::string>(),               "key in config file defining the processor to be used")
00152     ("input,i",  po::value<std::vector<std::string> >(), "input files");
00153   po::positional_options_description p;
00154   p.add("input", -1);
00155   
00156   po::variables_map vm;
00157   try {    
00158     po::store(po::command_line_parser(argc, argv).options(desc).positional(p).run(), vm);
00159     po::notify(vm);
00160 
00161     po::store(po::parse_command_line(argc, argv, desc), vm);
00162     po::notify(vm);
00163     
00164     if (vm.count("help")) {
00165       std::cout << desc << std::endl;
00166       return 1;
00167     }
00168     if (vm.count("version")) {
00169       std::cout << SVN_VERSION_STRING << std::endl;
00170       return 1;
00171     }
00172   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00173     std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00174     std::cout << desc << std::endl;
00175     return 1;
00176   }
00177   
00178   boost::filesystem::path fp(vm["config"].as<std::string>());
00179   LOGGER_INIT("./Log", fp.stem().native());
00180   try {
00181     // make up ptree config
00182     boost::property_tree::ptree config;
00183     read_xml(vm["config"].as<std::string>(), config, boost::property_tree::xml_parser::no_comments);
00184 
00185     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<FFTProcessor<float > > >("FFTProcessor_FLOAT");
00186     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<FFTProcessor<double> > >("FFTProcessor_DOUBLE");
00187     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<demod_msk_processor  > >("DemodMSK");
00188     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<demod_fsk_processor  > >("DemodFSK");
00189     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<tracking_goertzel_processor> >("TrackingGoertzel");
00190 
00191     const boost::property_tree::ptree& processor_config(config.get_child(vm["key"].as<std::string>()));
00192     
00193     std::cout << "type= " << processor_config.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.type") << std::endl;
00194     read_datastream rds(processor::registry::make(processor_config.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.type"),
00195                                                   processor_config));
00196 
00197     if (vm.count("input")) {
00198       std::cout << "input: [" << vm.count("input") << "]: ";
00199       BOOST_FOREACH(const std::string& input_filename,  vm["input"].as<std::vector<std::string> >()) {
00200         std::cout << input_filename << std::endl;
00201         rds.process_file(input_filename);
00202       }
00203       return 1;
00204     }
00205   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00206     LOG_ERROR(e.what()); 
00207     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00208     return 1;
00209   }
00210   return 0;
00211 }
